itemLabel: John Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Preston Candover

wikipedia_page.main: John Davan Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Preston Candover,  (2 November 1927 – 14 January 2022) was a British businessman and politician. He served as the President of Sainsbury's, and sat in the House of Lords as a life peer and member of the Conservative Party.

response: *  1927   – John Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Preston Candover, English businessman and politician
*John Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Preston Candover, of Preston Candover in the County of Hampshire (1927–2022) — Alan's eldest son (Conservative)

*John Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Preston Candover (1927–2022), great-grandson of John James Sainsbury and Sainsbury's chairman 1969–1992

In 1993 he joined with John Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Preston Candover to set up the Butrint Foundation to record and conserve the archaeological site of Butrint in Albania, close to his holiday home on Corfu. Today, Jacob remains Chairman of the Butrint Foundation.
* John Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Preston Candover (born 1927), grocer
